From watching the discord recently, the main focus has been getting the wallet and chain to function correctly.Â  Smartnode threshold limit for blocks was recently met so people have been working on getting those up for the network.

comments.body: Quote from: illusionoflove on January 20, 2023, 02:30:06 AMQuote from: GeePeeU on January 18, 2023, 12:28:52 AMYou say it's "Currently Useless". But is there anything being developed or is there any use-case intention ? From watching the discord recently, the main focus has been getting the wallet and chain to function correctly.Â  Smartnode threshold limit for blocks was recently met so people have been working on getting those up for the network.I would assume that would be done on test-net before launch ?Seems odd to have the main focus be "Getting the wallet and chain functioning correctly" when it's already listed on an exchange on main-net.
